STORY VISION PRODUCT PROCESS CAREERS NOTES FROM

Notes from

It’s been almost 10 years since Rent the Runway launched, and I am still just as excited to come to work and lead our incredible team as I was at the beginning. I am eager to share the latest happenings at the company and other topics that inspire me.

And, I would love to hear from you — your feedback, positive as well as constructive, is what pushes us to constantly improve and evolve (reach out at founders@renttherunway.com).


CEO and Founder
